title: Changing servers
body: If i change my server from Eune to EUW, does it mean that i have to pay again to go back to Eune?{{champion:22}}

replies.body:
If you transfer your account, yes. If you simply create a new account on EUW, it costs you nothing to play on EUW. If you're trying to see if you'll experience better latency (ping) on the EUW servers, I strongly recommend creating a new character to decide.

If you have any questions, please let me know.
